content: the color change then repeat for one more round continue in st st to the next color change on next color/stripe alternate the slipped stitches so that they look staggered as follows k2 the first stitch should be directly above a slipped stitch of the previous color change then sl 1 k3 repeating around to the beginning of the color change then slip the same stitches for one more round continue in st st to the next color change continue on in this way alternating between slipped stitch rounds and stockinette rounds until you reach your desired leg length 60st and 72st leg sl 1 knit 5 repeat around to the beginning of the color change then repeat for one more round continue in st st to the next color change on next color/stripe alternate the slipped stitches so that they look staggered as follows k3 the first stitch should be directly above a slipped stitch of the previous color change then sl 1 k5 repeating around to the beginning of the color change then slip the same stitches for one more round continue in st st to the next color change continue on in this way alternating between slipped stitch rounds and stockinette rounds until you reach your desired leg length 64st leg sl 1 knit 7 repeat around to the beginning of the color change then repeat for one more round continue in st st to the next color change on next color/stripe alternate the slipped stitches so that they look staggered as follows k4 the first stitch should be directly above a slipped stitch of the previous color change then sl 1 k7 repeating around to the beginning of the color change then slip the same stitches for one more round continue in st st to the next color change this size can also be done like the smallest size if you want your slipped stitches closer together continue on in this way alternating between slipped stitch rounds and stockinette rounds until you reach your desired leg length ©2022 holly isaac for personal use only hollyisaac on ravelry pattern support hollymocha3@gmail com 2 heel with mini wedge gusset you may continue the slipped stitch pattern in your gusset or not it doesn t matter i knit magic loop and have all my instep stitches on the first needle and my heel/sole stitches on the second needle all gusset stitches are worked on the instep side you may need extra markers if you use 9 circulars round 1 at beginning of round m1r pm knit 28 30 32 34 36 38 in pattern this is your instep pm m1l knit to end of round round 2 k1 sm work instep sm k1 knit in pattern to end of round round 3 m1r knit to marker sm work instep sm knit to end of instep m1l knit in pattern to end of round round 4 knit to marker sm work instep sm knit to end of instep knit in
